description.problem: Some properties have null displayName instead of string value
description.impact: MEDIUM - Properties missing user-friendly names in documentation, affecting UI generation and readability
description.affected_nodes:
supabase: 4 properties (type: fixedCollection)
date_time: 35 properties (Year, Month, Week, Day, Hour, Minute, etc.)
description.root_cause: Properties defined with computed/dynamic displayName in source TypeScript, or displayName missing entirely
description.fix_approach:
1. Add fallback displayName generation from field name (e.g., filterFields -> Filter Fields)
2. Handle null displayName gracefully in markdown generation
3. Investigate source TypeScript for actual displayName values
4. Convert camelCase field name to Title Case as fallback
